title: I, the Sacrifice, Somehow Killed the Evil God (LN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Manga   Caring Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Polygamy   Special Abilities
author: Marusei   まるせい
description:
Elt, who sacrificed himself to the evil god in place of his childhood friend.

He was supposed to...... meet his end by the evil god's attack.

However, his unique skill [Inventory] awakens and he finds himself fighting back against the evil god.

After returning alive, Elt decides to return to his home village to tell his childhood friend that he is safe.

On his way, he encounters a powerful monster while walking through the forest.

He plans to take advantage of the opportunity to escape, but discovers a girl unconscious beside the monster.......!?

A fantasy that begins at the last minute!>
